system.description:
When you select this archetype at 2nd level, you have advantage on Persuasion, Intimidation, Insight, and Deception checks made when dealing with fiends, celestials, fey, elementals, or aberrations and advantage on saving throws against their abilities.

Additionally, you learn one of the following languages: primordial, sylvan, infernal, abyssal, deep speech, or celestial.

Finally, you add the following spells to your spell list, which count as witch spells for you:
